items.question: How long does delivery take?
items.answer: For Gurugram and NCR we typically deliver within 3–5 business days after print. Bulk orders may take 7–10 days depending on quantity. We’ll confirm timelines when you place your order.

items.question: Do you do bulk or corporate orders?
items.answer: Yes. We handle bulk orders for HR, events and branding. You get dedicated coordination, bulk pricing and reliable delivery windows. Use the contact form or WhatsApp to request a quote.

items.question: What if my image is low quality or blurry?
items.answer: We use a print-optimisation step to improve clarity of low-resolution images so prints look better. This improves sharpness and contrast for print; it doesn’t alter faces or content. It’s included at no extra cost.

items.question: What payment options do you accept?
items.answer: We accept UPI, card and bank transfer. For bulk orders we can discuss payment terms. Details are shared when you confirm your order.
